name: Covert (itch)
description:
Hide in the crowd. Stay in cover. Locate your contact, and deliver secret documents without drawing attention. 

Find your target based on the color of his clothes and his location, as displayed on the bottom right of the screen

-CONTROLS-

WASD to move, SHIFT to run.
F to talk to your contact
If you are being arrested, you can shoot with the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
